-- | Convert Jalaali and Gregorian calendar systems to each other
--   
--   A few Haskell functions for converting Jalaali (Jalali, Persian,
--   Khayyami, Khorshidi, Shamsi) and Gregorian calendar systems to each
--   other.
@package jalaali
@version 0.2.0


-- | Functions for converting Jalaali and Gregorian calendar systems.
module Data.Time.Calendar.Jalaali

-- | Converts a Gregorian date to Jalaali.
toJalaali :: GregorianYear -> GregorianMonth -> GregorianDay -> JalaaliDate

-- | Converts a Jalaali date to Gregorian.
toGregorian :: JalaaliYear -> JalaaliMonth -> JalaaliDay -> GregorianDate

-- | Checks whether a Jalaali date is valid or not.
isValidJalaaliDate :: JalaaliYear -> JalaaliMonth -> JalaaliDay -> Bool

-- | Is this a leap Jalaali year or not?
isLeapJalaaliYear :: JalaaliYear -> Bool

-- | Number of days in a given month in a Jalaali year.
jalaaliMonthLength :: JalaaliYear -> JalaaliMonth -> Int

-- | This function determines if the Jalaali (Persian) year is leap
--   (366-day long) or is the common year (365 days), and finds the day in
--   March (Gregorian calendar) of the first day of the Jalaali year (jy).
--   
--   <tt>param jy Jalaali calendar year (-61 to 3177) </tt>return leap:
--   number of years since the last leap year (0 to 4) gy: Gregorian year
--   of the beginning of Jalaali year march: the March day of Farvardin the
--   1st (1st day of jy) <tt>see:
--   http:<i></i>www.astro.uni.torun.pl<i>~kb</i>Papers<i>EMP</i>PersianC-EMP.htm
--   </tt>see: http:<i></i>www.fourmilab.ch<i>documents</i>calendar/
jalCal :: JalaaliYear -> (LeapOffset, GregorianYear, DayInMarch)

-- | Converts a date of the Jalaali calendar to the Julian Day number.
--   
--   <tt>param jy Jalaali year (1 to 3100) </tt>param jm Jalaali month (1
--   to 12) <tt>param jd Jalaali day (1 to 29/31) </tt>return Julian Day
--   number
j2d :: JalaaliYear -> JalaaliMonth -> JalaaliDay -> JulianDayNumber

-- | Converts the Julian Day number to a date in the Jalaali calendar.
--   
--   <tt>param jdn Julian Day number </tt>return jy: Jalaali year (1 to
--   3100) jm: Jalaali month (1 to 12) jd: Jalaali day (1 to 29/31)
d2j :: JulianDayNumber -> JalaaliDate

-- | Calculates the Julian Day number from Gregorian or Julian calendar
--   dates. This integer number corresponds to the noon of the date (i.e.
--   12 hours of Universal Time). The procedure was tested to be good since
--   1 March, -100100 (of both calendars) up to a few million years into
--   the future.
--   
--   <tt>param gy Calendar year (years BC numbered 0, -1, -2, ...)
--   </tt>param gm Calendar month (1 to 12) <tt>param gd Calendar day of
--   the month (1 to 28<i>29</i>30/31) </tt>return Julian Day number
g2d :: GregorianYear -> GregorianMonth -> GregorianDay -> JulianDayNumber

-- | Calculates Gregorian and Julian calendar dates from the Julian Day
--   number (jdn) for the period since jdn=-34839655 (i.e. the year -100100
--   of both calendars) to some millions years ahead of the present.
--   
--   <tt>param jdn Julian Day number </tt>return gy: Calendar year (years
--   BC numbered 0, -1, -2, ...) gm: Calendar month (1 to 12) gd: Calendar
--   day of the month M (1 to 28<i>29</i>30/31)
d2g :: JulianDayNumber -> GregorianDate

-- | An Int representing a Jalaali year.
type JalaaliYear = Int

-- | An Int representing a Jalaali month (1-based).
type JalaaliMonth = Int

-- | An Int representing a Jalaali day.
type JalaaliDay = Int

-- | An Int representing a Gregorian year.
type GregorianYear = Int

-- | An Int representing a Gregorian month (1-based).
type GregorianMonth = Int

-- | An Int representing a Gregorian day.
type GregorianDay = Int

-- | An Int representing a Julian Day Number
type JulianDayNumber = Int

-- | An Int representing the day in March when converting a Jalaali year to
--   Gregorian.
type DayInMarch = Int

-- | An Int representing number of years since the last leap year.
type LeapOffset = Int

-- | A tuple for a Jalaali date.
type JalaaliDate = (JalaaliYear, JalaaliMonth, JalaaliDay)

-- | A tuple for a Gregorian date.
type GregorianDate = (GregorianYear, GregorianMonth, GregorianDay)
